publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: Buying stuff to remember
And I'm trying out just to live
I'm talking much, to get tired and sleep
Something's don’t mean
I'm holding you back forever
Happiness comes around every eight days
Set me to be loved the right way
Set me right.
You want to quit I need rings
You can feel everything
I can't reach
I wanna be here
I wanna be here
Now the sun comes up on you…
I'm taking time up to the limit
And I'm facing the life I don't want
Love me after all our troubles
Forgive me
Cause some things they don't mean
You want to quit I need rings
You can feel everything
I can't reach
